original_text: Be careful! Do not try to do wicked things. God has sent these troubles to test you. He wants to stop you doing evil things. Be careful! Do not try to do wicked things.
korean_text: 삼가 악으로 치우치지 말라 그대가 환난보다 이것을 택하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Do not try to do wicked things.
God has sent these troubles to test you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 시험하기 위해 이 환난들을 보내셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He wants to stop you doing evil things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 당신이 악한 일을 하는 것을 멈추게 하고 싶어하십니다.

sentences.original_text: Do not try to do wicked things.
